column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree in a technical field?
Has the founder previously held a CEO or president role?
Did the founder co-found the company with a small team?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Is the founder based in California?
Has the founder worked full-time at a large number of companies?
Does the founder have experience in the healthcare sector?
Did the founder start their company alone?
Has the founder received moderate press or media coverage?
Does the founder have a background in finance?
